ctx: intros n c s H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients, n : nat c : Client_index s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) H1 : lb_step_execution lb_step_async s H2 : Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) Server)) (S n) c Unable to unify "Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) Server)) (S n) c" with "weak_until (fun s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) Server)) (S n) c) (next (fun s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) Server)) n c /\\ (n = 0 -> In {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client c; pBody := Locked |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s)))))) s".

original: intros n c s H1 H2. apply H2.
